markdownRemark.html: Situated only a few minutes away from the center of Granada and half an hour drive from both the Sierra Nevada’s ski station and the Costa Tropical. Without a doubt one of the best golf courses in Granada. This is a long and fairly difficult course. It is an interesting course with many unusual features, such as the blind green on the 4th hole. There are stunning views of the Sierra Nevada from most holes and an excellent restaurant in the Clubhouse.

frontmatter.title: Santa Clara Golf Granada
frontmatter.description: Santa Clara Golf Granada - Situated only a few minutes away from the center of Granada and half an hour drive from both the Sierra Nevada’s ski station and the Costa Tropical. Without a doubt one of the best golf courses in Granada. This is a long and fairly difficult course. It is an interesting course with many unusual features, such as the blind green on the 4th hole. There are stunning views of the Sierra Nevada from most holes and an excellent restaurant in the Clubhouse.
frontmatter.address: Avda. del Juncalillo s/n, Otura, 18630 Granada, Spain
frontmatter.price: Highest green fee weekdays 52.00 euros, Highest green fee weekends 69.00 euros
